creditline: Gift of Samuel and Patricia McCullough
description: ship in calm water with crew, one of whom is climbing on mast; other ships in background; wood pilings at L and R
markings: potter\'s mark C, underside: (blue ladle) | sticker on bottom: Aronson Antiquairs / Amsterdam
signed: title lower C in blue: No 2. \'t Fielafjeeren van de Buysch
title: No. 2, Fielafjeeren van de Buysch (Putting the nets onboard), from "The Herring Catch"
